about_the_game:
It's time to forget about routine! The new royal King Pack DLC contains all the bonuses needed for a truly comfortable game. Purchasing the King Pack, you also get a VIP account level 2, which gives you access to the automatic system of the item upgrade.

DLC includes:
- Premium subscription for a one year period;
- A unique banner for your character;
- 10 keys of each type;
- A complete set of eternal elixirs;
- A full set of paints for equipment for one character.
detailed_description:
It's time to forget about routine! The new royal King Pack DLC contains all the bonuses needed for a truly comfortable game. Purchasing the King Pack, you also get a VIP account level 2, which gives you access to the automatic system of the item upgrade.

DLC includes:
- Premium subscription for a one year period;
- A unique banner for your character;
- 10 keys of each type;
- A complete set of eternal elixirs;
- A full set of paints for equipment for one character.
legal_notice: © 2016 OVALIS INVESTMENTS LIMITED. All rights reserved.
name: Panzar: King Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista/7/8
  • Processor: Intel® Core Quad Q9450 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom II x4 920 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 6790
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: DLC includes: Premium subscription for a one year period; A complete set of eternal potions; A complete set of paints for equipment and armor for one character; Unique banner for your character; Ten keys of each kind.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
